import React, { useState } from 'react' import {BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import './AuthPage.scss' const AuthPage = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const changeHandler = (event) =>{ setForm({...form, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) console.log(form) } const registerHandler = async () => { try { await axios.post('/api/auth/registration', {...form}, { headers: { 'Content-type' : 'application/json' } }) .then(response => console.log(response)) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return(
